  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(String description, Importance priority, Completed isCompleted, AnsiColor ansiColor) throws IOException
      Constructor for Task class. Contains data such as description, priority, and completion status. Also contains other "metadata" such as owner, last edited date, and added date.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the task.
      priority - The priority of the task.
      isCompleted - If the task is completed.
      ansiColor - The color of the task.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Get the task as a string. Note that this is not the same as the description, and is for testing purposes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the task as a string.

    • printTasks

      Prints all the tasks in a formatted way.
      Parameters:

    • printTasks

      public static void printTasks()
      Prints all the tasks in a formatted way, based off of the permanent ArrayList.

    • searchTasks

      public static ArrayList<Task> searchTasks(ArrayList<Task> tasks, String searchTerm) throws IOException
      Searches for a task based on the description.
      Parameters:
      tasks - the tasks to search through.
      searchTerm - the term to search for.
      Returns:
      the task/s that matches the search term.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • saveTasks

      public static void saveTasks(ArrayList<Task> tasks) throws IOException
      Saves the tasks to a formatted json file.
      Parameters:
      tasks - the tasks to save to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • loadTasks

      public static void loadTasks() throws IOException
      Loads the tasks from a formatted json file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • saveTasksToTxtFile

      @Deprecated public static void saveTasksToTxtFile(ArrayList<Task> tasks) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      because of the new json save system which is more effective.
      Saves the tasks to a formatted text file. The format is as follows: String|int|boolean|AnsiColor.
      Parameters:
      tasks - the tasks to save to the file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.

    • loadTasksFromTxtFile

      @Deprecated public static void loadTasksFromTxtFile() throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      because of the new json save system which is more effective.
      Loads the tasks from a formatted text file. The format is as follows: String|int|boolean|AnsiColor.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file is not found.
